DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate use resource titration Duodopa home .
DOC.brief_title: Duodopa Home Titration Using Telemedicine : Evaluation Use Resources
DOC.detailed_description: Telemedicine ( TM ) offer alternative titration procedure allow start Duodopa infusion home . The study evaluate use resource , measure number contact time spend health care professional ( Duodopa nurse specialist study Investigators ) TM technician , Duodopa infusion home . Data collect four ( 4 ) clinical center Sweden . Data collection period participant start decision administer Duodopa treatment ( Baseline ) end Duodopa titration period complete . Post-titration , participant caregiver interview investigator nurse answer web base questionnaire experience .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Suitable Duodopa treatment accordance Swedish Summary Product Characteristics 2 . Motivated confident test Duodopa home titration use TM 3 . Participants able handle infusion pump TM equipment assistance , determine Investigator 4 . Understood sign study inform consent form 1 . Dementia cognitive decline Mini Mental State Examination score less 24 2 . Ongoing symptomatic depression , hallucination psychotic behavior without adequate treatment , determine Investigator 3 . Contraindications describe Swedish Summary Product Characteristics : hypersensitivity levodopa carbidopa , narrow angle glaucoma , serious liver kidney disease , severe heart failure , acute myocardial infarction , severe cardiac arrhythmia , recent acute stroke , contraindication adrenergic effect ; pheochromocytoma , hyperthyroidism , cushing 's syndrome , contraindication abdominal surgery 4 . Other reason make participant unsuitable home titration use TM , determine Investigator
